venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
Hi Everyone,

For April's meet-up we'll be heading to Tavern in the Square in Central Square for Dinner and/or Drinks. It's a great opportunity to catch up and meet some new people in Boston. It is also game 5 for the Bruins/Habs playoff series. The game will be on, come down to the Tavern and cheer on your team!

Hope you can make it!

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: Look for my picture at the left of the meet-up page.
item.why: the Bruins are playing the Habs!

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian April Meetup
